title: Fun Football Friday
description:
Jason Fitz, Ryan McGee and Sam Acho discuss Mike Gundy's comments from Big 12 Media Days, the reception of USC and UCLA at the upcoming Pac-12 Media Days. Most intriguing matchups, Underrated storylines and most unique place to play a college football game.
